sources.title: GRI Sustainability Disclosure Database
sources.synthesis: GRI hosts 13,000+ sustainability reports from organizations in 100+ countries. Reports follow GRI Standards (most widely used ESG reporting framework). Database searchable by company name, year, sector, and country. Provides report metadata and download links.
key_facts: Free public access to search and download
sources.relevance: Primary Tier 2 data source for sustainability reports not in SEC EDGAR (international companies, non-public companies, voluntary ESG reporters)

sources.title: SASB Standards and Materiality Map
sources.synthesis: SASB provides industry-specific standards for 77 industries across 11 sectors. Each industry has 3-8 material ESG issues. SASB Materiality Map identifies which issues matter most by industry. Many companies reference SASB in SEC 10-K filings and sustainability reports.
key_facts: Used in SEC filings and investor communications
SASB Navigator provides company-specific material issue guidance
sources.relevance: Tier 2 source for identifying material ESG issues and linking to company disclosures. Complements SEC EDGAR by highlighting ESG-specific sections in 10-K filings.

sources.title: Yahoo Finance Symbol Search API
sources.synthesis: Yahoo Finance provides free, unauthenticated API for ticker symbol lookup. Returns company name, ticker, exchange, and asset type. No rate limits documented. Covers all publicly traded companies globally. Ticker can be used to retry SEC EDGAR search with more precision.
key_facts: JSON response with ticker, company name, exchange
sources.relevance: Tier 2 fallback for resolving company name ambiguities. Converts company name → ticker → CIK for SEC EDGAR retry.

sources.title: AlphaVantage Symbol Search API
sources.synthesis: AlphaVantage provides free ticker lookup API with registration. Rate limit: 5 requests/minute (free tier). Returns best-matching symbols for search keywords. Covers US and international exchanges. Requires free API key from alphavantage.co.
key_facts: JSON response with ticker, name, region, match score
sources.relevance: Fallback ticker lookup if Yahoo Finance fails or returns ambiguous results. Rate limit acceptable for batch processing.

sources.title: SEC Company Tickers JSON
sources.synthesis: SEC provides official mapping of ticker symbols to CIK numbers. Updated daily. JSON format with 10,000+ public companies. Used in Task 006 for CIK lookup. Ticker field can be used to validate ticker→CIK mappings from Yahoo/AlphaVantage.
sources.relevance: Ground truth for validating ticker→CIK mappings from Tier 2 ticker lookup providers. Ensures accuracy of company identification.

sources.title: Task 006 Multi-Source Ingestion Results
sources.synthesis: Task 006 achieved 83.3% data availability (5/6 companies) using SEC EDGAR alone. Identified need for Tier 2 providers to reach 90-95% target. CDP corporate data requires paid access (Open Data Portal = municipal only). Fuzzy name matching and 20-F support critical for success.
key_facts: CDP limitation: Corporate data not in free API
JPMorgan Chase edge case: CIK found, 0 2023 filings
sources.relevance: Establishes baseline for Task 007. Identifies gaps Tier 2 must fill (non-US companies, non-SEC filers, name ambiguity edge cases).

synthesis_summary: Task 007 will implement three Tier 2 providers to increase ESG data availability from 83.3% (SEC EDGAR only) to ≥90%. GRI Database provides global sustainability reports (13,000+ organizations). SASB Navigator identifies material ESG issues by industry. Yahoo Finance ticker lookup resolves company name ambiguities for SEC EDGAR retry. Combined, these sources address gaps in Tier 1: international companies (GRI), non-SEC filers (GRI), and name variations (ticker lookup).
assumptions: GRI Database remains publicly accessible without paid subscription
SASB Standards Navigator provides company-specific disclosure links or guidance
Yahoo Finance API continues to operate without authentication
SEC company_tickers.json updated regularly (daily cadence maintained)
2023 sustainability reports published by October 2025 (current test date)
